Key Arguments: The proposed legislation contradicts the principles of freedom and open-mindedness that are foundational to Australian society.
The author believes that during the COVID-19 pandemic, scientific data was ignored by the government and media, leading to unnecessary societal measures.
The author argues that the media and government spread misinformation by contradicting available scientific data, particularly regarding COVID-19 mortality risks and vaccine safety.
The legislation could lead to censorship and control, reminiscent of dystopian societies described in literature.
Notable Quotes: It taught us that what some claim is misinformation or disinformation is in fact the truth.
It felt like living in a twilight zone, with highly respected scientists publishing data that was ignored.
How can we in all honesty now create a fair and equitable misinformation and disinformation legislation?
The proposed legislation is a complete contradiction to Australian freedom and will stifle our citizens and society.
